channel.title: Y0u g0t pk3d
channel.description: he told me to rep him on MSN and The Un-Named told me to take a screen shot but i didnt know how, but now just report him if he asks you to rep him.

item.title: Y0u g0t pk3d
item.dc:creator: @Original Original
item.description:
@Original wrote:

To take a screenshot

  1. Go to what u want to take a screenshot
  2. Press PrtScn on your keyboard.
  3. Open up mspaint
  4. Edit what you want like croping and whatever
  5. Save it
  6. Go to imageshack.us and host it
  7. Get the direct image then show here.

Hope that helpsâ€¦ =\
